mapper.insert: insert into award_history values( award_code_seq.nextval, #{user_id}, nvl(#{award_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, null), nvl(#{award_org, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, null), nvl(#{award_date, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, null), nvl(#{contents, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, null) )
mapper.select: select award_code, user_id, award_name, award_org, award_date, contents from award_history where user_id = #{user_id} order by award_date desc
